Description: Saudi Cement Co (Known as: SCC) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. It operates within the Materials sector focusing on Construction Materials. It has Companies operating across Bahrain, Saudi Arabia and Kuwait, working on Paper Packaging and Construction Materials. SCC is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia and was established in November 1955.

Shareholder Name: General Organization for Social Insurance - Saudi Arabia
